title: IHCL inks deal for Taj, Vivanta hotels in Dhaka
description: The Taj- and Vivanta-branded greenfield hotels will be a part of an integrated complex that will also include high-end retail, the company said. Puneet Chhatwal, managing director and chief executive officer, IHCL, said the chain is delighted to debut in Dhaka, adding an important international destination to its portfolio.
